name: Car Delivery Man
description:
Become a driver who delivers cars to different countries. Immerse yourself in the nostalgic open world of the late 90s. Discover the adventure by driving through various routes, testing your driving skills and delivering vehicle carefully.

Game Features:
- Delivery of various cars.
- Decide for yourself which route you will take.
- Ability to earn money to buy cars.
- Driving from the first and third person.
- Possibility to get out of the car.
